CustomField.description: Select the new status for the related incident, if applicable. For example: if this update is about the resolution, then the incident's status could be "monitoring" or "resolved".
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Select the new status for the related incident, if applicable. For example: if this update is about the resolution, then the incident's status could be "monitoring" or "resolved".
CustomField.label: New incident status
